Plot: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.
Title: Scream 2
Actors: Jada Pinkett Smith, Omar Epps, Paulette Patterson, Rasila Schroeder
tomatoConsensus: As with the first film, Scream 2 is a gleeful takedown of scary movie conventions that manages to poke fun at terrible horror sequels without falling victim to the same fate.
